H0.text: Who played the character Mrs. Merton on TV. Caroline Aherne

H1.text: Who played the character Mrs. Merton on TV. Kathy Burke

H2.text: Who played the character Mrs. Merton on TV. Julie Walters

H3.text: Who played the character Mrs. Merton on TV. Mrs Murton

A4.text: Caroline Aherne played the character Mrs Dorothy Merton on The Mrs Merton Show

A5.text: The original portrayal of the character as 'Mrs. Murton' was not picked up by Yorkshire TV

A6.text: Caroline Aherne played the character Mrs Merton on The Mrs Merton Show

A7.text: Yorkshire TV (Leeds-based ITV) did not pursue the Mrs Murton's Nightcap pilot
